**Saturday, Jan 4: ‘R Bootcamp’ (attendance optional)** *(at [Institut Pasteur de Madagascar](http://www.pasteur.mg/) in Antananarivo)*

      * Assigning variables

      * Running a script

**Sunday, Jan 5: ‘R Bootcamp’ (attendance optional)**

* 9:00-10:00am: [Tutorial: Writing For-loops, If-Else Statements, and Functions in R](E2M2-2020/Tutorials/E2M2_Bootcamp_If_Else.zip) __(Fidy, with help from mentors)__
